name: The Hitman's Bodyguard: The Hitman vs. The Bodyguard
description: Ryan Reynolds and Samuel L. Jackson star as an elite bodyguard and renowned hit man who is forced to work together. In order to succeed, they don't just have to avoid getting killed, they have to avoid killing each other.

review.author: verbfan
review.heading: Such a good movie
review.reviewBody: This was such a good movie there was a lot of action ,comedy and it was put together well. This is by far one of my favourite Ryan Reynolds movies.
